name: less stuff (firefox 3+)
description:
- some one-liners to hide elements or make them look more consistent
- optimized for 'text only' menu bar


history:
+ small fix for height of entries in single line address bar (2012/04)
+ small fix for hovering over tabs (2010/04)
+ bug fixes, comments (2010/03)
+ tab bar: no borders around tabs, no backgrounds except for active tab (2010/03)
+ button text: "Tab" instead of "New Tab" (2010/02)
+ no icons in the search bar (extreme, but cool! 2010/02)
+ no rss button (new name in firefox 3.6., 2010/01)
+ no "new tab" button in tab bar (firefox 3.5, 2009/09)
+ no star button
+ no looking glass button
+ no menu bar borders
+ no rss button
+ one-line address bar
+ hide edit and help menu
+ persistent go button
+ yellow bg for https
